tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),
review:
Our marriage has lasted about 10 years and we've tried many options in Bengaluru for conceiving a child. There was no success.

As a patient, finding a gynecologist who not only possesses exceptional medical expertise but also exudes warmth and compassion can be a daunting task. However, my search came to a gratifying end when I discovered Dr. Akhila Anand.


From the moment I stepped into the Hospital, I was greeted by a friendly and efficient staff, setting the tone for a positive experience. 


Dr. Akhila Anand herself is a consummate professional, ************* * ***** ** ********* *** expertise that instilled confidence in me from the outset. She took the time to thoroughly listen to my concerns, asking pertinent questions and addressing each with care and attention to detail. Her ability to communicate complex medical information in a clear and understandable manner was truly commendable, leaving me feeling informed and empowered in my healthcare decisions.

What truly sets Dr. Akhila Anand apart, however, is her genuine concern for her patients' well-being. Beyond just treating symptoms, she takes a holistic approach, considering not only the physical but also the emotional aspects of health. Her empathy and bedside manner are second to none, making even the most sensitive discussions feel comfortable and respectful.

During examinations and procedures, Dr. Akhila Anand maintained a reassuring demeanor, ensuring I felt comfortable and supported throughout. Her gentle and skilled approach inspired confidence, making what could have been an anxiety-inducing experience surprisingly manageable.


We 100% recommend Dr. Akhila Anand. She is not just a competent gynecologist but a compassionate healthcare provider who genuinely cares for the well-being of her patients. My experience under her care has been nothing short of exceptional, and I am grateful to have her as my trusted medical partner. 

I'm conceiving for the first time now and I'm excited and nervous at the same time. I'm excited to see what the future holds for me and nervous about the challenges I'll have to face. I can't wait to meet my baby.

If you're in search of a gynecologist who combines expertise with compassion, look no further than Dr. Akhila Anand.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor explains all the process involved in the treatment and if you are facing any problems she is easily reachable and make us think positive. I am very happy with the treatment and within 3 months in the 1st attempt I got conceived. Very happy and satisfied with her treatment. She has lots of patience to listen to our problems and she will make us to understand why the problems are rised and why it's so complicated and how to come out of the problems and she tells whats the  best way to treat our problems.She has come up with very Rich Experience on her Professional services and she holds the professional Ethics to treat the patient.I recommend others for better treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Before Completion of our first year of Marriage I thought of giving good news to our family, But till 9th month we dint got result, Then I visited Thamara Hospital for the treatment of Irregular Periods, On first visit I met Dr.Akila Anand and explained my problem she clearly guided me and started treatment on day one itself and with in a month my period became regular and again I missed my period!!!! , On our First wedding Anniversary we gave good news to our family as we thought!!! Thanks to Dr Akhila Madam and Team Thamara for the reason of our happiness. We Highly recommend for who are facing any issue relates to Pregnancy. Everything is possible with these highly qualified professionals.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

We have been conceived due to the detailed analysis of the doctor and the treatment provided by her Extremely happy with the treatment provided by the doctor also the doctor is very friendly in nature and listens to the problems and analyses and then provide solutions.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
By God Grace we met Dr. Akhila Madam for Infertility Treatment(IVF) for us she is a God sent Angel. She is experienced doctor with great expertise knowledge and friendly wonderful doctor, she can handle High Risk pregnancy in difficult phases. Now I became mother and recommend every one should go and meet Dr.Akhila Anand atleast once so that you will get confidence on you becoming Mother with delivering Healthy Baby.
I am personally very thankful to Dr. Akhila Madam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was trying since 14yrs to conceive.. my age 34yrs .. visited many hospital for treatment .. dint get any result..finally i met dr akhila anand at tamara hoslital for same issue.. she explained everything and i followed madam advise..i got a positive result in first attempt only.. thank you so much madam for completing our family..

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: Our heartful thanks to Dr. Akhila Anand who treated us infertility and made us to Parenthood within 1.2 years from the date we visited her. Her excellence way of treating in a friendly manner was made us to deliver a healthy baby boy. Again thanks a lot Madam for fulfilled our dream of parenthood and making us happy in our life.

I am madappa i visited so many hospital in bangalore for ivf treatment, we dint get result 
so  i visited tamara hospital rajaji nagar. There we met dr akhila mam and we got hope and trust , we got a successful treatment in 1st attempt only and my wife delivered baby boy after 11years of our married life .. now our life is color full and complete. special thanks to dr akhila madam. .. I thank tamara team ..i am really very happyðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜Š I recommend everyone to take madam consultation once and get successful treatment..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I was referred to Dr. Akhila by my friend, we were planning for a baby from one year but because of irregular cycles I was not getting conceived.
Later I told my problem and doc started our treatment soon within 3months Doc suggested to do IUI treatment and treatment was successfully done and I got conceived.
That was the happiest moment in our life's.
Me and my husband are Thank ful to Akhila mam
I would definitely recommend to consult Akhila doc for positive and quick results.

Thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We have met Dr Akhila for my infertility case for which we have been suffering for a long .I had a a failure in my 1st IVF cycle and unexpectedly I got a chance to meet Dr Akhila .After meeting her I got a day of hopes and confidence through her experience and dedication towards her profession .I really got convinced by her excellent way of treatment and understanding the health issues of patient .I am pregnant now which is really a dream come true for me and my husband and especially my family .

We strongly recommend Dr Akhila Anand for anyone who is looking for a considerate doctor for their infertility treatment .

Thanks 
Chithra

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
1. Though we scheduled appointment well in advance. We had to wait for one n half hour to meet the doctor. 

2.Toilets cleanliness was not good.

3. Inside the consultation room privacy is not maintained. Every now and then assistants would enter or stand by door. Doors were not closed properly and all the discussion could be heard sitting outside. *** **** ******** *********** *** ************** ************
4. Sometime we saw two different patients were consulted in parallel. Even when we entered consultation room. Previous patient was in examination section and discussion could be heard easily.

tags: Wait time,
review: I recommend Dr.Akhila mam,  she is friendly with all patients and  I got conceived within 4 months Iam happy with treatment.

review: I felt much comfortable from the first visit to doctor. I am overwhelmed by doctors Friendly behaviour and way of explaining my  health condition and treatment procedures. Felt more more like a family member than doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr akhila is a wonderful doctor her friendly talk with a smile gave me all confidence and hope.. We were waited many years for baby.. At last with madam grace i got successful result and my wife is pregnant now.. Words are very less to express my feelings.. Thanks to dr akhila madam and tamara hospital and team for everything.. Dr akhila mam supports well during treatment and pregnancy.. I strongly recommend madam

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr akhila anand is patient friendly and genuinely explains your issues and suggest best treatment for you.. I have been trying since 8yrs of marriage.. We got successful positive treatment in the first attempt itself.. I thank you Dr Akhila mam  and team for completing our dream of having baby.. I strongly recommend each and everyone to consult Dr Akhila mam for infertility issue...

review:
We were referred to dr Akhila madam by family friend .. our first meet was so impressive.  Doctor brings positivity and fills so much of confidence, that it's a great source of relief. Her way of approach to
Issues are straight and explains patiently about health condition.After many years of struggle I conceived in first attempt with twins.Dr Akhila amazing doctor whom I can't forget in my life.. Thank you madam.

My Heartful thanks to Dr. Akhila Anand who treated us infertility, bought joyness with delivering a Healthy Baby Boy to Family within 1 year of consulting Doctor. 
All my Family including my New born Baby personally recommend to consult Dr. Akhila Madam to have a Wonderful Parenthood life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My hearfull thanks to Dr akhila Anand madam .. we were married for 10yrs and we consulted Dr akhila Anand at Tamara hospital for infertility treatment. Madam explained our issues in conceiving in detail and hospital staff were very good and co-operative. We got a positive result in first go and at present she is 4months. Many thanks to Dr akhila madam and staff. I strongly recommend Dr akhila to all infertility couple's for treatment.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Married life of 12yrs .. Visited many hospitals for treatment..  Consulted Dr Akhila at Tamara hospital. Conceived at first IVF treatment.. Many thanks to everyone..  We found new life of journey we satisfied with  Dr Akhila anand and staff ** **** **** ********** we never forget TAMARA hospital.. Blessed with 2 boy babies..  We strongly recommend Dr Akhila for any IVF related  treatment..

I had a superb experience with Dr. Akhila Anand. 
From the first try only I got convinced and excited about beginning my IVF journey with her.
*** ****** ** **** ************** patience and gentle throughout the whole process. 
I would completely recommend seeing her. My experience was made less daunting, and

& all the staff of your clinic.
